1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Salamah bin Qais said to me:The Messenger of Allah said to me: 'When you perform ablution, clean your nose, and when you use pebbles to clean yourself after defecating, use an odd number

chapter.eng-name: Going to extremes in sniffing water up into the nostrils and blowing it out
